page.title: 15 Education.
page.content: } In the area the schools aren't very large. There are many pre-school playgroups with an age range of 3-5. The village playgroups are normally held in village halls or in a church hall. These are usually run by mothers. The village schools in Bradford Peverell and Stratton have closed down because they were uneconomic. The children who live in these villages have to go to Charminster which caters for the 5-9 age group. All children who are 9-13 go to Dorchester middle school, most people from Bradford Peverell and Charminster go to St. Osmonds. From 13-18 boys go to Hardyes,and girls go to Castlefield school.
